name: Awesome Snow Cone Frozen Ice Food Dessert Maker
name_original: Awesome Snow Cone Frozen Ice Food Dessert Maker
description:
Who's ready to make some Snow Cones!

Top Crazy Games is bringing you the best cooking and baking game with all of your favorite snow cone creations. Play and make your own today!

Features:
- Choose your snow cone shape: cone or cup
- Choose your favorite flavors
- Mix them
- Decorate your snow cone
- EAT IT! EAT IT AGAIN AND AGAIN!

Dozens to choose from:
- Flavors
- Decorations: Fruits, candy, spoons , sticks
- and More!!!!!

Download this game right now and have fun making and creating!

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app . You can adjust your device settings to deactivate in app purchasing.
